testsuite.name: Scenario: Cancel removing content

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
When I enter valid information for the question name as "Remove Content 2"
And I click the question designer Save & Close button
Then I see that I am on the Content Repository page
And I select the question by name "Remove Content 2"
And I click the "Remove" button in the bulk row
And I click the Cancel option
Then I am on the Content Repository page with the "Text" column open
